categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Goji" was the nickname of a clone trooper pilot who was the leader of Red Squadron in the Republic Navy during the Clone Wars. He flew a BTL-B Y-wing starfighter marked with the colors of Red Squadron at the Battle of Malastare.

In 22 BBY, Red Squadron leader Goji and clone gunner Rod were temporarily incorporated into the Republic forces on Malastare when the Separatists invaded. Their Y-wing was loaded with a prototype weapon known as an electro-proton bomb, which was successfully released on target, creating a massive electromagnetic pulse that deactivated or destroyed all the droid forces gathered on Malastare.
As a bomber pilot, Goji possessed innate skill and extensive training in delivering weapons, such as the electro-proton bomb, accurately to their targets.
As with every clone trooper in The Clone Wars TV series, Goji was voiced by Dee Bradley Baker. Hasbro released its 3-3/4" Goji action figure in 2010.
Goji's name and the markings on his helmet are a tribute to the Japanese name 'Gojira'(ゴジラ), known more commonly in English as Godzilla.
